text: Excited to highlight the incredible work of Rudra Nagalia, a driven MHA student leveraging tech to revolutionize healthcare! By combining his expertise in product development & entrepreneurship with a passion for improving health outcomes, Rudra's transforming mental health care through the Remind-H project.
